comments: Never had a more catastrophically inept teacher in my life. Condescending, forgetful, snobbish and just plain terrible. Usually, when my peers don\'t like a professor I assume it\'s because they\'re a tough grader, but our mutual disdain for her was completely her own doing. I\'ve never had a teacher scoff and roll her eyes at students\' ideas before.

This teacher is not for unprepared college students. She is only for real college students. Her expectations are college level, so don\'t expect to be babied, for example pay attention in class, take notes, keep track of dates and assignments, READ, do your work. I\'ve taken her twice and only got an A once, she makes you earn your grade, not given.

She is strict. you have to read the materials and do the research. I am a terrible writer and that is what I learned in her class that I suck at writing. I tried. I have mild dislexia so that made it harder for me, had a lot of grammer mistakes on my papers. YOU MUST KNOW CORRECT MLA FORMAT

Amazing teacher!Love the way she teaches and is Extremely helpful. Although there is a lot of work required, she is very clear, open minded, and allows a lot of interaction in class.If you didn\'t like her class, it was probably because your lazy!Got A\'s in both her classes and I always told her how great she was!Take her class you won\'t regret it!
Her class is really, really, really, really good. challenging but so good. I had 79 and she gave me the B. I love her because she taught me how to write.
Horrible. If you\'d like to take a political argumentative class, this is the one for you! In terms of english: Blunt, over analytical, and rude if you don\'t follow her instructions.

\xc2\xa0The best. Period.\xc2\xa0She showed me how to be a college student and how to be successful. \xc2\xa0Her class has meaning. Not trying to win a popularity contest like the other english teachers. She keeps it real. Maybe because she really is a writer. Off the chart good.

This teacher is extremely wonderful and incredibly cool. Great open discussions of EL+IC. This is the first English class at Mission where it felt like a real college course. Challenging in a good way. Lots of group work really helped me improve my writing and my grade. You will be so lucky if you can get into her class.

She starts off like a good teacher but when the class continue, she becomes unclear in what she wants in her paper. SHE DOES ACCEPT LATE WORK AT ALL. VERY UNREASONABLE ABOUT LATE WORK WILL FAIL YOU IF YOU MISS AN ESSAY! RISKY TEACHER, DONT TAKE!

GREAT teacher! Very fair grader. I learned so much thanks to her. Lots of reading and writing. Keep up with assignments and you will do fine. Workshops for papers really helped me. lots of comments on papers helped too. Take her!

Teacher wasn\'t always clear with her teaching. She would often tell us to refer to the syllabus instead of asking her questions when she had plenty of time to answer us. When we refer to the syllabus it still made no sense then she would tell us to refer to our colleagues. I would ask my colleagues and they didn\'t understand either.

I really like this teacher. I have taken her for every class since eng 21. Her classes have lots of group work and intertesting talks about the readings. She tries really hard to help everyone understand what to do. I wish all teachers were like her. Recommend for sure!
very tough professor. I have to drop this class with W. you should not take her.

Her class is difficult and if you want an A you have to be totally committed. There\'s a lot of work to be done (homework almost daily, two argument papers, two exam essays, big research paper, and the final) but she is very helpful if you seek her. Take advantage of office hours! She\'s VERY strict with deadlines. Attendance is mandatory.

The professor is an awesome teacher. I thought her class was difficult for the most part but if you follow everything she says and the syllabus you WILL pass her class. I passed with a \'B\' and I know I deserved it thanks to her. I definitely recommend her! You must do all her assignments in order to pass.
Ladinsky\'s class is the best. If you want to learn to write, take her. Lots of group work. I finally get how to write!

Very boring class, She taught straight out the book. doesn\'t allow you to pick your own topics for writing papers. Taught out of Book standing up to the madness, a book about corruption in the world. More of a routine class. Do your work and you\'ll pass just fine.

She is a very cool teacher. class is challenging but you can rewrite your paper for an A grade. Helps u if you ask . lots of readings but the topics are good. Makes u think alot. Really cares about students making it to 4 yr.
Excellent professor. If you are willing to apply yourself, she is a great choice for an English professor.
She is worth the challange! I leared how to write from her. Tons of group work. I am glad I had her cuz I learned SO much. Keep up with the work and u\'ll do fine. good teacher
